mapper.insert: INSERT into course_video (path, pay_coin, course_id, record_time, teacher_id) VALUES (#{path}, #{payCoin}, #{courseId}, #{recordTime}, #{teacherId})
mapper.select: SELECT v.id, v.path, v.pay_coin, (SELECT name FROM course WHERE id = v.course_id) AS courseName, v.record_time FROM course_video AS v

SELECT cv.path, t.name AS teacherName, cs.name AS courseName, cv.pay_coin, c.name AS collegeName, cv.record_time FROM course_video AS cv JOIN teacher AS t on cv.teacher_id=t.id JOIN college AS c ON t.college_id = c.id JOIN course AS cs ON cs.id=cv.course_id
SELECT pay_coin FROM course_video WHERE id=#{id}
